title: SMC_NC_GFunctionTable (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_NC_GFunctionTable : STRUCT
A table of functions of type
SMC_NC_IFunction
.
The function blocks
SMC_ReadNCFile2
and
SMC_ReadNCFromStream
accept such a table to add additional functions that can be
used in expressions in the G-Code.

rows.Name: wVarListID
rows.Comment:
In order to make sure we deal with an SMC_NC_GFunctionTable.
Do not change.

rows.Name: numFunctions
rows.Comment: The number of functions to be added

rows.Name: pFunction
rows.Comment:
Pointer to an array of SMC_NC_GFunction, containing the
functions to be added
